Posts.Content: babsie8903 wrote: My path. report:  Right breast mass (2.9 cm), core biopsy:  ductal carcinoma in situ with a small 1.0mm focus of microinvastion -- DCIS, cribriform and solid types, nuclear grade II, with necrosis.  ER & PR positive.  HER-2 -- dr. said not to pay attention to this as the path report after lumpectomy has correct info. I don't fully understand all of this.  I did agree to a lumpectomy followed by 5-7 weeks of radiation.  Most likely will be on hormone therapy.  To be determined after final path report.  Drs. said this is all very good, positive info.  Is it??  Please share any information you may have for me.  Thanks in advance.
